Megatron/Rowdy Wolf:





Megatron turned to KitKat. He watched as a large wolf-bot came to her side, 
dressed in brown, heavy furs. He had a nervous look on his face. Rowdy Wolf 
placed his rifle behind his armor and tugged at his own furs.

"So, this is the Rowdy Wolf Quicksrike spoke of." Megatron said, glaring at 
him. "I am proud to have you on our Predacon ranks." He thought to himself 
as he recalled Quickstrike telling him he was a Maximal. He may have to a 
looked after.

Rowdy Wolf nodded and pulled the corners of his mouth back. It was becoming 
ovious to Megatron that he was getting overheated with all those heavy furs.

As Rowdy Wolf stripped off a few layers off, Megatron turned his head back 
to KitKat. He sighed at her. "If you must, go ahead and look for the Fuzor."
